Django News Application

API Tests

class News_app.tests_api.APITestSetup(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: APITestCase

Base setup class for API test cases. Initializes a test user, category, publisher, article, newsletter, and comment for use in all derived API test classes. Handles authentication and test data creation.

setUp()[source]

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

class News_app.tests_api.ArticleAPITests(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: APITestSetup

API tests for the Article model. Covers listing, creation, retrieval, update, deletion, unauthorized access, and invalid data scenarios for articles.

test_create_article()[source]

Test creating a new article via the API. Asserts that the article is created successfully.

test_create_article_invalid_data()[source]

Test creating an article with invalid data. Asserts that invalid creation is blocked by the API.

test_delete_article()[source]

Test deleting an article via the API. Asserts that the article is deleted successfully.

test_list_articles()[source]

Test listing articles via the API. Asserts that the response is successful and returns the article list.

test_retrieve_article()[source]

Test retrieving a single article via the API. Asserts that the response is successful and returns the article detail.

test_unauthorized_create_article()[source]

Test that unauthorized article creation is blocked by the API.

test_update_article()[source]

Test updating an article via the API. Asserts that the article is updated successfully.
